landing.title: DeSports Network
landing.description: Building a sustainable ecosystem by integrating the eSports into the blockchain
landing.view-tokenomics: Ver economía del token y distribuciones

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics and Distributions
tokenomics.description: $DESP a deflationary token launched on July 4th 2021, running on the BSC Network. DeSports Network is a vast, long-term project requiring significant development, marketing, and operations. Every transaction will consist of a 10% fee, which will be applied in the following manner:

tokenomics.title: 4% Automatic liquidity pool
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

tokenomics.title: 1% Competition Rewards
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

tokenomics.title: 1% Redistributed to the ecosystem
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

tokenomics.title: 2% Foundation and decentralized platform development
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

tokenomics.title: 2% Marketing, Operations and eSports financing
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

tokenomics.title: 25% Manual buybacks(?)
tokenomics.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.
